column7: at avera mother joseph manor of aberdeen. mass of christian burial will be 10:00 a. m.
column11: at st. marys catholic church; fr. j. joseph holzhauser as celebrant. burial will follow mass at st. marys catholic cemetery. visitation is 5-7:00 p. m.
column13: at the mortuary with a liturgical wake service at 7:00 p. m.
